entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, I want to return something. It's a VeloBand Pulse I bought a couple of weeks ago. This thing is junk.
I understand your frustration. I can certainly help you with a return. Can I get your order number, please?
It's #VF789213. Hurry up, I don't have all day.
Thank you. I see your order for the VeloBand Pulse here. To confirm, you'd like to initiate a return? Could you tell me what the problem is?
The heart rate monitor is completely inaccurate! I wore it during my run yesterday, and it said my heart rate was 60. Sixty! I was sprinting! It's a faulty smart watch. I want my money back.
I apologize that you're experiencing issues with your VeloBand Pulse. Let me quickly check our return policy for smart watches. Just one moment, please.

Okay, I have your order details here, and according to our return policy, you have up to 90 days from the date of purchase to return your item for a full refund. This is our standard return policy on most items.
90 days? Seriously? That's it? I've only had it for a little over two weeks. I thought I had longer. This is ridiculous. I need this resolved quickly.

I understand your concern. As I said, you are well within the 90-day return policy. Let me initiate the return process for you. I'll send you a prepaid shipping label to your email address on file. Simply pack the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.
Okay, fine. As long as I get my money back. How long will that take?
Once we receive the returned item, your refund will be processed within 7-10 business days. You'll receive an email confirmation once the refund has been issued.
Alright, that sounds good. I appreciate you handling this. Usually when you have to involve a manager or something it takes forever.
You're welcome! We aim to make the return process as smooth as possible. Is there anything else I can assist you with today regarding your VeloBand Pulse, or any other VeloFit product?
No, I think that's all. Thanks for your help!
You're very welcome! Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a great day!
